caress.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to touch someone gently in a way that shows you love them
caress.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: His hands gently caressed her body.
caress.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to touch something gently, in a way that seems pleasant or romantic
caress.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a gentle touch or kiss that shows you love someone
